changes.description: Added 'birthDate' field under HolderInput and BookPaxInput. Holds the passenger's date of birth.
Added 'idDocuments' field under HolderInput and BookPaxInput. Contains a list of passenger identification documents using the new input type IDDocumentInput.
Added new input type 'IDDocumentInput'. Defines the structure for passenger identification documents, including type, number, issuer, issueDate, expiryDate, nationality, and otherTypeDescription.

Added 'paymentCard' field under HotelCriteriaAmendBoardCommitInput, HotelCriteriaAmendDatesCommitInput, HotelCriteriaAmendPaxesCommitInput, and HotelAmendRoomsCommitInput. Specifies payment card information when payment is done by credit card.
Added 'paymentType' field under HotelBookingAmend. Specifies the payment type of the option quoted.
The 'type' field in PluginsInput is deprecated.
The 'step' field in PluginStepInput is deprecated.

Added 'apps' field under HotelQuote. Provides information about the apps solutions. Only returned if app integrations are enabled. You can see more details [here](https://docs.travelgate.com/docs/apis/for-buyers/hotel-x-pull-buyers-api/plugins/requote).
Added 'phone' field under ContactInfo. Represents the phone contact of the holder or passenger.
Added 'surcharges' field under HotelBookingDetail. Lists surcharges associated with the booked option.
The 'NOT_SPECIFIED' value in PersonalTitleType enum is deprecated.
The 'optionType' field under HotelBookingDetail is deprecated.
Added 'supplements' field under HotelBookingDetail. Lists supplements associated with the booked option.
Added 'supplierCode' field under HotelOptionQuote. Indicates the supplier code of the selected option.
Added 'accessCode' field under HotelOptionQuote. Indicates the access code of the selected option.
Added 'accessCode' field under Warning. Indicates the access code related to the warning.
Added 'vccAccess' field under GeneratedPaymentInfo. Indicates the VCC access code used to generate the payment card at the Book step.
Added new input type 'CurrenciesFilterInput'. Allows filtering hotel options by included or excluded currencies using 'includes' and 'excludes' lists.
Added 'currencies' field under HotelXFilterSearchInput. Uses the new 'CurrenciesFilterInput' to filter options based on desired currencies.
The 'occupancyRefId' field under OneStepBookRoomInput has been made optional. Previously it was required.
The 'hotelCode' field under HotelOptionQuote has been added. Code of the hotel in the context selected. The hotel code will be the same as the hotel code in the search request.

The 'hotelCodeSupplier' field under HotelOptionQuote has been added. Code of the hotel in supplier context. If the supplier does not provide the hotel code, then the hotel code will be the same as the hotel code in the search request.

The 'occupancies' field under HotelOptionQuote has been added. List of occupancies for the request. If the supplier does not provide the occupancies, then the occupancies will be the same as the occupancies in the search request.

The 'rateRules' field under HotelOptionQuote has been added. Specifies rate rules of the option returned. Note: If the option does not have any rate rule, then the option is NORMAL rate. If the supplier does not provide the rate rules, then the rate rules will be the same as the rate rules in the search request.
This field in the input settings for all booking flow and booking management calls is deprecated. It will no longer be supported and will be removed on 01/05/2025.

The 'KO' status has been completely removed as a valid value for BookStatusType. If a booking fails, an error will be returned. For more details, please refer to the [connection error codes](docs/apis/for-buyers/hotel-x-pull-buyers-api/making-requests/errors-and-warnings/booking-flow).
The 'supplier' field under AddOns. This field provides extra information from the Supplier layer if it is returned in the response.

The 'hoursBefore' field under CancelPolicy -> CancelPenalties has been deprecated (search, quote, book, cancel and booking read). The cancelPenalties information is now provided in the 'deadline' node. More info [here](kb/faqs/faqs-cancel-policies/cancel-policies-and-deadlines-closer-look). This field will be completely removed on 01/05/2025. Please stop including it in your queries.
Added new input `supplierCode` in hotels query. You can see more details of `hotels` query in the documentation [here](docs/apis/for-buyers/hotel-x-pull-buyers-api/content/hotels).
Add 3 new fields in PaymentCardInput.
Strong Customer Authentication (3DS): 3DS data can now be included with a Payment Card in a book request alongside payment card data.
Virtual Credit Cards (VCC): Extra information about Virtual Credit Cards can now be included with a Payment Card in a Book request.

Now the booking and cancel services allow the user to retrieve and cancel a book with the new field returned in book response `bookingID`. You can see more details of `bookingID` in the documentation [here](docs/apis/for-buyers/hotel-x-pull-buyers-api/booking-management/booking-read).
Add new enum type PaymentCardType which contain list of supported payment cards.
Add new field `type` of type PaymentCardType into PaymentCardInput and deprecate old field `cardType`.
Type HotelData introduces field RoomConnection (same type as Rooms service operation).
Modified RoomData type by adding the new types RoomSource (string) and OccupancyStatic.
Deprecated description from Bed (search).

The 'market' input under from search criteria is deprecated. The market information should now be provided through the 'markets' input, which allows specifying one or more markets at the same time. This field will be completely removed on 01/05/2025. Please stop including it in your queries.

The 'market' field under Options node is deprecated in the search response. Alternative: Use the 'markets' node for market info of options. his field will be completely removed on 01/05/2025. Please stop including it in your queries.

The 'token' field under Options node is deprecated. This field is no longer returning any value and should not be included in your search queries. It will be completely removed on 01/05/2025. Please ensure that you no longer request this field in your queries.

The 'checkIn' field under 'rs.Booking.Hotel' is deprecated. Alternative: The check-in date is now returned in the 'start' field.  It will be completely removed on 01/05/2025. Please update your queries accordingly.

The 'checkOut' field under 'rs.Booking.Hotel' is deprecated. Alternative: The check-out date is now provided in the 'end' field.  It will be completely removed on 01/05/2025. Please ensure your queries are updated to use the new field.
